mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTR(mem_add,1,4) as local, count(*) as count FROM member WHERE mem_kind = '01' AND mem_add like '%경기%' OR mem_add like '%경상%' OR mem_add like '%전라%' OR mem_add like '%충청%' GROUP BY SUBSTR(mem_add,1,4)
SELECT a.ctgy_name as local, count(*) as count FROM category a, cvs_service b WHERE a.ctgy_id = b.ctgy_id GROUP BY a.ctgy_name

SELECT tbl3.mon,c.mem_cvs_name as id, tbl3.amount, tbl3.rnk FROM --단, 순위가 3등까지만 출력 (SELECT tbl2.mon,tbl2.place_id,tbl2.rslt AS amount ,tbl2.rnk FROM ( --inline view결과 + 순위 SELECT tbl1.mon,tbl1.place_id,tbl1.rslt,rank() OVER(partition by tbl1.mon order by tbl1.rslt desc) rnk FROM ( --월별, 지점별, 판매개수합을 구하기 SELECT TO_CHAR(a.supply_date,'MM') mon, a.PLACE_ID, nvl(sum(b.splylist_sum),0) rslt FROM supply a inner join supply_list b ON( a.supply_bcd = b.supply_bcd) WHERE TO_CHAR(a.supply_date,'yyyyMM') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(sysdate,-3),'yyyyMM') AND TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyyMM') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(a.supply_date,'MM'), a.PLACE_ID ORDER BY 1,2 ) tbl1 ) tbl2 WHERE tbl2.rnk <= 3) tbl3, member c WHERE tbl3.place_id = c.mem_id

select tb2.prod_name, tb2.amount, tb2.rnk from (select tb1.prod_name, tb1.amount, ROW_NUMBER() over(order by tb1.amount desc) as rnk from (select a.prod_name, sum(b.splylist_sum) as amount from prod a, supply_list b, supply c where a.prod_id = b.prod_id and b.supply_bcd=c.supply_bcd and c.supply_state = '10' and to_char(c.supply_date,'yyyyMM') between to_char(ADD_MONTHS(sysdate,-3),'yyyyMM') and to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMM') group by a.prod_name )tb1 )tb2 where tb2.rnk <=5

SELECT tb2.prod_name, tb2.amount, tb2.rnk (SELECT tb1.prod_name, tb1.amount ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY tb1.amount desc) AS rnk (SELECT a.prod_name, count(*) as amount FROM prod a, bookmark b WHERE a.prod_id = b.prod_id GROUP BY a.prod_name )tb1 ) tb2 WHERE tb2.rnk <=5

select tb2.mem_cvs_name, tb2.amount, tb2.rnk (select tb1.mem_cvs_name, tb1.amount ROW_NUMBER() over(order by tb1.amount desc) as rnk (select a.mem_cvs_name, count(*) as amount from member a, bookmark b where a.mem_id = b.place_id group by a.mem_cvs_name )tb1 ) tb2 where tb2.rnk <=5
